title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. runner with REST & CLI APIs, Docker images, and model library.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: First-class LangChain LLM & chat interface for Ollama; drop-in replacement for OpenAI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library wrapping Ollama’s REST API with sync & async clients.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; file uploads, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI frontend for chatting, model management, and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline code completion & chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama supporting Kotlin, Gradle/Maven, streaming & embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; includes Rails generator and background jobs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama pipelines inside containers for CI/CD model testing.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, fine-tune adapters, etc.

title: ollama-guardrails
summary: Lightweight middleware adding input/output moderation to Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot bringing local Ollama models to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel conversations with reaction triggers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, note summarization, and semantic search.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Spigot/Paper plugin letting players chat with local LLMs via in-game commands & NPCs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-command docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Weaviate vector DB & Nginx.
